name: Boraam Aviation, Inc.
about: Boraam Aviation, Inc. is a dedicated flight school committed to promoting aviation and providing superior, professional flight training. Located in Prospect Heights, Illinois, our school aims to educate individuals from all walks of life about the joys and intricacies of flying. We offer a range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial, Flight Instructor (CFI), and Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII). Our well-maintained fleet of airplanes ensures safety and quality training. With a focus on affordability without compromising safety, we make flying accessible to aspiring pilots. Our instructors, such as Marlon, are highly praised for their teaching skills and ease of scheduling. At Boraam Aviation, we strive to create a supportive and educational environment for all our students. We are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
